articles.title: Chinese Grand Prix postponed due to deadly coronavirus outbreak
articles.description: The 2020 Chinese Grand Prix has been postponed due to the deadly coronavirus outbreak, Formula One announced on Wednesday.
articles.content:
(CNN)The 2020 Chinese Grand Prix has been postponed due to the deadly coronavirus outbreak, Formula One announced on Wednesday.
